chapter.title: Extensions
chapter.subtitle: A better way to design rich applications with a small team, while having programming partnership with the entire world. -Steven Rosato
chapter.para: Extension is undeniably the top amongst Majisti's core components. Following the modularity Majisti is trying to accomplish, extensions form the library itself. Besides the core, extensions actually make the library become alive and usable. It completes the framework by adding its missing concreteness by using its well established abstractness.
